line.text:

Allow additional travel time.

Detour is as follows:

Southbound: Via Lexington Av, left on 23 St, right on 3 Av and regular route.

The bus stop on 3 Av between 23 St and 24 St will by bypassed in both directions.

Allow additional travel time.

M1, M2, M3, M5, M14A, M14D, M21 and M103 buses are running with delays in both directions, due to a street closure on 2 Av between 14 St and E Houston St.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 03/28/2015 10:59AM

M8, M15 and M15-SBS buses are detoured, due to a partial building collapse on 2 Av at 8 St.

Detour is as follows:

M15 and M15-SBS Southbound: Via 2 Av, right on 23 St, left on 3 Av, left on Houston St, right on Chrystie St and regular route.

M8 Eastbound: Via St. Marks Pl, left on 3 Av, right on 14 St, right on Avenue A, left on 10 St and regular route.

All corresponding stops will be made on the detoured route.

M8, M14A and M14D are running with extensive delays in both directions.

Allow additional travel time.

Until further notice

line.name: Verrazano-Narrows
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 03/16/2015  6:24AM

VNB - UPPER LEVEL TRAFFIC PATTERN

 

Monday thru Thursday: 5 AM to 9:30 AM (3) Lanes Brooklyn-bound. (2) Lanes Staten Island-bound.

2:30 PM to 10PM (3) Lanes Staten Island-bound. (2) Lanes Brooklyn-bound.

 

 Friday: 5 AM to 9:30 AM (3) Lanes Bklyn-bnd. (2) Lanes Staten Island-bound.

1:30 PM to 11:59 PM (3) Lanes Staten Island-bound. (2) Lanes Brooklyn-bound.

 

 Saturday and Sunday:

 Three (3) Lanes Staten Island-bound. Two (2) Lanes Brooklyn-bound.

line.name: Babylon
line.text:
Planned Work

Babylon Branch Diesel Train Service Affected by Weekend Trackwork

 

Concrete tie installation and trackwork will affect service on the Babylon Branch for five weekends - March 28-29, April 11-12, 18-19, 25-26, and May 2-3. 

 

On each weekend, all regularly scheduled Babylon Branch electric trains will run on normal weekend schedules between Babylon and Penn Station.

 

However, there will be no diesel trains running to/from Jamaica and Babylon.

 

Please pick up the special Babylon Branch Weekend Trackwork Timetable - dated March 28-29, April 11-12, 18-19, 25-26, & May 2-3, 2015 - for travel during these weekends, or see http://bit.ly/1N4QenP.

line.name: Montauk
line.text:
Planned Work
Buses Replace Weekend Trains between Babylon & Speonk due to Trackwork

Buses will replace trains on the Montauk Branch between Babylon and Speonk from 1 AM Saturday until 1 AM Monday, on five weekends - March 28-29, April 11-12, 18-19, 25-26, and May 2-3 - while the LIRR installs concrete ties between Sayville and Patchogue and performs trackwork between Babylon and Patchogue.

The busing will be as follows:

Westbound
  • Customers at stations from Speonk through Bay Shore will board buses and transfer at Babylon for connecting train service to all points west. Buses will depart up to 42 minutes later than normal train times.
  • Montauk through Westhampton customers will board trains and transfer to express buses at Speonk for service to Babylon, where train service will resume. Please plan for up to 84 minutes of additional travel time.

Eastbound
  • Customers will board buses at Babylon for stations Bay Shore through Speonk.
  • Customers traveling to stations Speonk through Montauk will board buses at Babylon, then transfer back to trains at Speonk for service to points east. Please plan for up to 50 minutes of additional travel time.

Please pick up the special Montauk Branch Trackwork Timetable - dated March 28-29, April 11-12, 18-19, 25-26, & May 2-3, 2015 - for specific train and bus info, or see http://bit.ly/1DTPvEr.

line.name: Hudson
line.text:
Delays  Posted: 03/28/2015 10:34AM

Hudson Line Customers may experience slower travel times this weekend (Mar 28-29) due to planned track maintenance. Some southbound trains may experience 10-15 minute delays. We appreciate your patience.
